item.title: Zed
item.description:
I’m tired of VS Code because there are too many features, menus, and options that easily distract me.

However, I tried Zed editor and my first impression was its minimal UI and distraction-free interface. It’s a great editor for those who want a simple and focused text editing experience.

I’m using IntelliJ for Java development because JetBrains is the GOAT for Java!

I’m using Zed for Golang, Python, and everything else!
